message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's better to settle now than to lose money to inflation later.
I'm willing to give you a little more, but I'm not going to let you take the lion's share. Let's split it more evenly this time.

Bob, I understand you want a fair deal. But the clock is ticking and the value is decreasing. Let's meet in the middle - my last offer was $60, yours was $45. I'll take $55, you take $45.  This is my final offer.
